user_not_registered: I see you're new around the block here.
I don't think I've seen you here before.
user_new_keyboard_button: Let me tell you something about myself.
user_registered_already: No need for that, I remember you!
I see you're already in my books!
I have seen you around here before!
username_too_short: I'm sorry, I have trouble remembering short names! Try again please!
username_too_long: No way I can remember that! You have to come up with something shorter!
Oops, that's really long! Make it shorter please.
username_invalid_characters: Could you drop those weird characters, please? It makes my head hurt!
The symbols, what do they mean?
I don't know what those characters mean, can you please tell me again without them?
I am unable to process some of these characters.
joke_no_current: That's weird, I didn't say nothing!
joke_no_favorite: As much as I hate to admit it, you have never laughed at my joke. And that's kind of sad when you think about it.
That's not possible. You don't find my jokes funny ðŸ˜”
joke_new_keyboard_button: I'm sure you haven't heard this one before!
joke_new_ask: Hit me with your best shot!
joke_too_short: Once again, please. That was too short.
I know you can make a joke longer than that.
joke_too_long: I already forgot the first part! Try again, but you have to cut it short!
Thats a really long joke! Mind cutting it a bit short?
I already forgot the first part! Try again, but you have to cut it short!
I thought this joke would never end! Give me a shorter one please!
I have trouble remembering something that long, could you cut it shorter next time?
I lost you there at the end... Please tell me again, but try to keep it shorter.
Haha! Wait, how did it start?
joke_submitted: I don't get it, but thank you!
Haven't heard that one before - nice!
no_new_jokes: I told you all of them!
I am out of jokes. Maybe you got some for me?
Can't think of anything else, sorry!
my_jokes_all_jokes_shown: Sorry, I don't have any more jokes
my_jokes_invalid_choice: Please select either next or cancel.
my_jokes_no_jokes: You didn't tell me any joke yet!
remove_joke_select: Please enter the ID of the joke to be deleted
remove_joke_received_not_integer: That's not a number! Try again
remove_joke_confirm: There's no going back after this.
remove_joke_success: That wasn't a good one, anyway.
Don't worry, next one will be better.
remove_joke_invalid_id: Oops! You definitely didn't tell me that one! Try again
permission_denied: You don't have permission to do this
